scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=test DB_USER=root DB_PASSWORD=root DATABASE=tw_users PORT=8080 node index
scripts.db:create: docker run --name tw_users -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=root -e POSTGRES_USER=root -e POSTGRES_DB=tw_users -p 5432:5432 -d postgres
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test DB_USER=root DB_PASSWORD=root DATABASE=tw_users mocha tests/
